name: SynFutures
description: SynFutures is a leading decentralized protocol for perpetual futures, democratizing the derivatives market by empowering users to trade any asset and create arbitrary futures contracts within seconds. Itâ€™s V3 oAMM introduces the industry's first-ever integration of a unified AMM and on-chain matching order book model. To date, SynFutures has raised over $38 million from prominent investors, including Pantera Capital, Polychain Capital, Dragonfly Capital, Standard Crypto, and SIG, among others.
